News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 26th February
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 26th February
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: Sunday 26th February
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with two games being shown live on Sky Sports. At 13:30pm Tottenham Hotspur take on Stoke City at White Hart Lane, before Manchester United and Southampton face off in the League Cup Final, which kicks off at 16:30pm. 

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
